snippet: Free apps like Secret, Whisper, Random and Randid give users an opportunity to learn, be shocked or amused, or find inspiration.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column; number of free apps for iOS and Android, including Secret, Whisper, and Random, offer users opportunity to share anonymous tidbits.
lead_paragraph: Free apps like Secret, Whisper, Random and Randid give users an opportunity to learn, be shocked or amused, or find inspiration.

headline.main: Apps for Sharing Secrets and Gossip
